element.name: deinterleave
element.description: Splits one interleaved multichannel audio stream into many mono audio streams
element.author: Andy Wingo <wingo at pobox.com>, Iain <iain@prettypeople.org>, Sebastian Dröge <slomo@circular-chaos.org>

element.name: interleave
element.description: Folds many mono channels into one interleaved audio stream
element.author: Andy Wingo <wingo at pobox.com>, Sebastian Dröge <slomo@circular-chaos.org>
